turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi there. I just wanted to order four small thin crust pizzas with pepperoni, sausage and mushrooms.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, the sausage pizza is not available on thin crusts, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so i have 3 small pizzas. one pepperoni, one sausage and the other is mushroom, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, not correct. I wanted four small thick crust pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And I wanted them all with sausage, pepperoni, and mushroom.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: oh, sorry. so i have 4 small thick crusts sausage, pepperoni and mushroom on all of them. is that it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thank you so much. When will it be ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas should be ready for pickup in 50 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds good, thank you so much.
